explanation: [0-0] A man with short brown hair, wearing a watch on his wrist, a colorful patterned T-shirt, and blue denim shorts, is sitting on a white sofa. He's holding a black remote control, lifts it, presses a button, then places both hands in front of him, looks ahead with a happy expression. On the sofa are various fruit-shaped pillows. The background wall is purple.

[0-9] A woman in a pink T-shirt and blue jeans appears from the right side of the frame and sits next to the man, holding a yellow plush toy. She pats the man twice with her right hand, he turns his head and looks at her questioningly, still holding the remote. Then the woman tilts her head to the right, pinches the toy in her hand, and looks at the man. The man turns his head to the front, puts the remote control on his leg, puffs out his cheeks, and pokes them with his fingers. The woman opens her mouth in surprise, spreads her hands, and leans forward.

[9-18] Immediately, the scene switches to the woman sitting on the sofa, head down, holding a yellow rectangular toy with both hands. The man walks over from the right side of the frame with a smile, sits next to the woman, still holding the yellow toy, reaches out his left hand and pats the woman, who turns her head to look at him. The man blows on the toy in his hand, causing it to stretch out. The woman raises her left hand and waves it, then puts the rectangular toy on her lap with her right hand, opens her mouth, covers both ears with her hands, and leans forward. The man turns his head to the right and glances at the woman, then faces forward with a crooked mouth, making a surprised expression.
